title: Who killed the sale?
creator_credit: Michael Tuchner, Anthony Pelissier, Ian Latimer and Rank Organisation Short Films Group
brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Customer and You”.
An amusing film in Cleese style of a case study which shows that employees in all parts of a company can affect a company’s ability to get and to keep business. With Bud Tingwell.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Tuchner, Anthony Pelissier, Ian Latimer and Rank Organisation Short Films Group
